Title: Happy Birthday
Writer: Courtney A. Kemp (created by), Safia M. Dirie, Jeff Dix (executive story editor), Monica Mitchell (story editor), Gabriela Uribe (staff writer), Andre J. Ferguson (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: The St. Patricks celebrate Tariq's birthday without Raina. Ghost is on the outs with Tate and learns Dre is ready to replace him in the legitimate world. Kanan drops Tariq at school, bonding over their mistrust of Ghost.
